modName: Halo 4 chief armor multiple color choices

descriptionHtml:
here it is!!! that armor set everyone's been looking for,..... drum roll please...
HALO 4 ARMOR!!!! IN MULTIPLE COLORS!!! sorry, there is no neck. (if anyone can help me add a neck that would be great....)

MxR, if you see this, please know that i am a big fan and i hope to see this in one of your videos :]
author: EPICKAJIZ23
